H0.text: Predators are organisms in an ecosystem that capture and kill other animals for food, such as lions.

H1.text: Hunters are organisms in an ecosystem that capture and kill other animals for food.

H2.text: Alphas are organisms in an ecosystem that capture and kill other animals for food, such as lions.

H3.text: Leaders are organisms, such as lions, that capture and kill other animals for food in an ecosystem.

A4.text: At the top of this food chain are apex predators such as lions.

A5.text: Predation is a biological interaction in which one organism, the predator, kills and eats another organism, its prey.
